name: A pair of obsidian plated chausses
data: It increases the users strength colossally.
It increases the users dexterity superbly.
It increases the users constitution divinely.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users intelligence adequately.
It decreases the users charisma adequately.
It has excellent armour class for its type (average in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration colossally.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users fire resistance superbly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
